```{r}
library(forecast)
library(lubridate)
library(zoo)
```



```{r}
land.temps <- read.csv('GlobalLandTemperaturesByCountry.csv')
head(land.temps)
land.temps$dt <- as.Date(land.temps$dt)
land.temps
```
```{r}
NA.temps <- land.temps[land.temps$Country == 'North America',]

SA.temps <- land.temps[land.temps$Country == 'South America',]

AF.temps <- land.temps[land.temps$Country == 'Africa',]

EU.temps <- land.temps[land.temps$Country == 'Europe',]

AS.temps <- land.temps[land.temps$Country == 'Asia',]

AU.temps <- land.temps[land.temps$Country == 'Australia',]
```




```{r}
NA.ts <- ts(NA.temps$AverageTemperature, start = c(1900), end = c(2010), frequency = 12) 
SA.ts <- ts(SA.temps$AverageTemperature, start = c(1900), end = c(2010), frequency = 12) 
AF.ts <- ts(AF.temps$AverageTemperature, start = c(1900), end = c(2010), frequency = 12) 
EU.ts <- ts(EU.temps$AverageTemperature, start = c(1900), end = c(2010), frequency = 12) 
AS.ts <- ts(AS.temps$AverageTemperature, start = c(1900), end = c(2010), frequency = 12) 
AU.ts <- ts(AU.temps$AverageTemperature, start = c(1900), end = c(2010), frequency = 12) 
```


```{r}
plot.ts(NA.ts, xlab = 'Time', ylab = 'Average Temperature', bty = 'l', ylim = c(-20, 40))
```


```{r}
plot.ts(SA.ts, xlab = 'Time', ylab = 'Average Temperature', bty = 'l', ylim = c(-20, 40))
```
